title: Saeima deputies fall foul of the law with traffic violations and a weapons offence
summary_full: There may be only 100 members of the Latvian parliament, but that didn't stop nearly a tenth of them falling foul of either the law or the Saeima's own rules between September last year and January this year.
summary_public: There may be only 100 members of the Latvian parliament, but that didn't stop nearly a tenth of them falling foul of either the law or the Saeima's own rules between September last year and January this year.

LV.label: neutral
LV.evidence: deputies fall foul of the law with traffic violations
